name: Fruit Master-Coin Master Story
description:
Welcome to the journey of luck and play amazing games with your Facebook friends!
Spin slot machine every day and earn coins. Destroy villages, building and houses of friends and other players with one blow to earn more coins!

Earned gold coins and rewards you can spend on building houses, statues, ships, plant flowers, cars and other items!
Collect cards and send them to your friends or get collection rewards!
Unlock different villages, building and new levels! Become a real king and master of coins!
Connect with Facebook and get free spins, free coins, invite friends and get tons of bonuses!

Try to complete all villages: pirate king island, piggy go village, coin master lands, homescape and many others.

Do you like games where you can raid facebook friends, become a king of slot and earn huge bonuses? Earn coins and bonuses with free slot game.

● Play on Facebook with friends and players from all over the world online!
● Great Graphics and animations, exciting music effects
● Attack and Raid other villages, dig cache and get rich
● Absolutely addicting games with gold coins and prizes
● Destroy buildings of your rivals and help your friends improve villages
● See your name on the leaderboard!
● Simple and addictive gameplay, casual game for master of coin
● Amazing slots, casino
● Share and invite with friends to earn bonuses
● New levels every week!
● Earn huge bonuses!
